en_question: Determine the minimum-cost combination of five candidate feeds so that each animal receives at least 700 g of protein, 30 g of minerals, and 100 mg of vitamins per day. Feed composition and prices are provided in Table 1-22.
cn_question: 确定五种饲料的最省费用组合，使每头动物每天至少获得 700g 蛋白质、30g 矿物质和 100mg 维生素。表 1-22 给出了饲料组成与价格。
